channel.title: Genolocity - Development, new pictures every 24-48 hours
channel.description:
Ok so First of all, we have only designed the start of the client bunghole.
We have changed the Background a little, and the login box and button, but not yet changed the text.
here is a image.
[img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/5339/babbyzzzz.png[/img]
We are currently working on the Login menu screen that pops up when you enter the game!
Please post wether we should make it a technichal screen, or runescapy if you get me.
Thanks for reading.
(we are also just waiting for our host to put our site up as it's been down for dayssss...)
